name: Advantor Systems
overview: Advantor Systems Corporation manufactures and integrates security technology solutions for organizations. It offers hardware design, software development, system manufacturing, pre-deployment integration and assembly, systems installation, and logistical support. The company provides integrated monitoring systems, badging systems, access control systems, intrusion detection systems, visitor management systems, automated gate entry systems, security cameras and video surveillance CCTV systems, flight line security, government systems, GSA schedule, USAF-certified systems, and support solutions. It serves department of defense, department of energy, department of homeland security, domestic agencies, state and local government agencies, schools and universities, healthcare sector, and companies. The company was formerly known as Advantor Products Corporation and changed its name to Advantor Systems Corporation in October 1997. Advantor Systems Corporation was founded in 1965 and is based in Orlando, Florida.

milestones.description: McCarthy Capital Invests in Advantor Systems
milestones.source_description: McCarthy Capital Invests in Advantor Systems
